data.actual_result: Popup goes on top of the white bar but behind the white circle
data.expected_result: Popup is fully over the toggle
data.short_description: Input sensitivity popup goes behind the white circle in the auto sensitivity toggle
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into Voice & Video in settings - Turn off the auto sensitivity if you have it turned on - Adjust the input sensitivity so that the popup is where the toggle is - Observe how the popup is overlaid with the toggle
